title: Add tests for query_all, query_by_assignee, and query_by_priority
description:
## Problem

Three query functions in `commands/query.rs` have no dedicated test coverage:

- `query_all(state, assignee, priority, label)` — multi-filter composition
- `query_by_assignee(assignee)` — filter by assignee string
- `query_by_priority(priority)` — filter by priority level

Other query functions (query_ready, query_blocked, query_by_state, query_by_label, query_strategic, query_closed, query_available) all have tests.

## Approach

Add integration tests in `crates/jit/tests/` following the existing pattern in `query_tests.rs`:

1. `query_all` — test each filter individually and in combination, test empty results
2. `query_by_assignee` — test exact match, no match, multiple issues same assignee
3. `query_by_priority` — test each priority level, empty results

## Acceptance Criteria

- [ ] All three functions have dedicated tests
- [ ] Tests cover basic cases, empty results, and filter combinations
- [ ] All existing tests still pass
